# Next Stream From Schedule in Chat [(by Shansoo)](https://www.twitch.tv/lebluxtv)

## Description

Will Display the next scheduled stream in the chat 
![image](/extensions/next-stream-from-schedule-in-chat/images/170582915-67c14b57-ba59-4506-bb6b-6947bab88338.png)

## Installation
```text

```

## Configuration
In the `Sub-Action` named `Execute Code (Get Schedule Info)`
![image](/extensions/next-stream-from-schedule-in-chat/images/170584063-df72f63f-0765-4681-9624-a23c8167c748.png)

>You may need to set the entire path to your settings.json line 57 ( in streamer.bot's folder > data folder )
>![image](/extensions/next-stream-from-schedule-in-chat/images/170584358-e366698d-7444-4fb3-862b-dd5cf93a495b.png)
{.is-info}

Also, Make sure, you set up all field in the schedule: without an end Time or a category, it won't work. 
( editing the C# code to erase classes and variables used could bypass this restriction ) 

DLL's To Reference :
![image](/extensions/next-stream-from-schedule-in-chat/images/170585445-3af591c3-bf5d-437e-a311-90bd8457ac3e.png)
